 *Installation is super easy and should take < 10 mins. There aren't
 any dependencies to worry about and this software won't alter 
 anything elsewhere on your computer. Email me if you aren't sure 
 about anything or run into any issues!*

ja.moggridge@gmail.com

----

## Install R

- Go to here: https://cran.utstat.utoronto.ca/
- See the 'Download R for..' links in the top section?
- Click the version for your system (Win, Mac, Linux).  
  - Win page -> click 'base' version, download on next page.  
  - Mac page -> find the version for your processor (intel or arm) on the next page, download.
- Once the installer package finishes downloading, open it.
- Click 'continue' a bunch of times.
- Install will complete eventually ✅
- You can close and delete the installer package now.

----

## Install Rstudio IDE

- Go here: https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/  
- Find "RStudio Desktop - open source license - Free" -> click Download.
- Next page will show you the version for your OS, click download.
- Once the installer package finishes downloading, open it.
- Click 'continue' a bunch of times.
- Install should complete eventually ✅.
- You can close and delete the installer package now.

----

## Verify installation (optional)

You should be able to open Rstudio now. Find the 'Console' window in the app. Type 2+2 at the command prompt (after '>') and see if you get 4. Congrats, you're ready to go!
